TextView.android:text: Deendayal Upadhyay SahKarita Kisan Kalyan Yojana

The Government of Uttarakhand has introduced a farm loan scheme called Deendayal Upadhyay SahKarita Kisan Kalyan Yojana as an initiative to assist small and marginal farmers of the state.

This scheme will provide loan facilities to strengthen the rural economy and to improve the financial conditions of the farmers.

Under this scheme, the Uttarakhand government will provide loans of up to the farmers of the state at the low-interest rate.

The government will provide soil health card to the farmers so that they can use seeds, fertilizers or pesticides as per soil requirement.

Direct Benefit Transfer is implemented in the state to transfer subsidies directly to the farmerâ€™s bank accounts to buy fertilizer.

Also, the beneficiaries can get free gas connections under this scheme.
